Join

Why Join?

UC Berkeley Robotics gives you the chance to put the things you've learned in school to the test. You'll be assisting the team in designing and building an insanely awesome robot, learn about the engineering fabrication process, and interact with sponsors and professional engineers. Moreover, you'll be hanging out with people who are just as passionate about Robotics as you are!

Are there any requirements to join?

The only requirement is that you're passionate about working on an awesome robotics project! Regardless of your background, you'll be able to find your niche here, as there are positions in everything from Business to Industrial Relations to Engineering.

How to Join:

Please email apollojain@berkeley.edu to be added to our mailing list.
